SEARCH
Module com.example.sesion4
Package com.example.sesion4.model

Class Enemigo

java.lang.Object
com.example.sesion4.model.Enemigo
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnemigoInterface
public class Enemigo extends Object implements EnemigoInterface
Implementation of the enemy behavior in the game. Manages both enemy ship placement and shooting logic based on current mode. Implements EnemigoInterface to provide enemy functionality.

    Constructs a new enemy instance with specified mode.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemigo

      public Enemigo(boolean esModoDisparo)
      Constructs a new enemy instance with specified mode.
      Parameters:
      esModoDisparo - true for shooting mode, false for ship placement mode

  • Method Details

    • inicializar

      public void inicializar()
      Initializes enemy components based on current mode. In shooting mode: prepares the shooting grid. In placement mode: prepares the ship grid.
      Specified by:
      inicializar in interface EnemigoInterface

    • realizarAccion

      public int[] realizarAccion()
      Performs enemy action based on current mode. In shooting mode: executes an attack and returns coordinates. In placement mode: generates ships and returns invalid coordinates.
      Specified by:
      realizarAccion in interface EnemigoInterface
      Returns:
      int array with coordinates [col, row], or [-1, -1] in placement mode

    • obtenerCuadricula

      public CuadriculaJuego obtenerCuadricula()
      Gets the appropriate game grid based on current mode.
      Specified by:
      obtenerCuadricula in interface EnemigoInterface
      Returns:
      The enemy's shooting grid or ship grid depending on mode

    • setModoDisparo

      public void setModoDisparo(boolean esModoDisparo)
      Sets the enemy's operational mode.
      Parameters:
      esModoDisparo - true for shooting mode, false for ship placement mode

    • isModoDisparo

      public boolean isModoDisparo()
      Checks the current operational mode.
      Returns:
      true if in shooting mode, false if in ship placement mode

    • getCuadriculaEnemigo

      public EnemigoCuadricula getCuadriculaEnemigo()
      Gets the enemy's ship grid manager.
      Returns:
      The EnemigoCuadricula instance handling ship placement
